DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study to examine efficacy and safety of intravesical botulinum toxin type A.
DOC.brief_title: Intravesical Instillation of Botulinum Toxin Type A to Patients With Urge Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: refractory urge urinary incontinence neurological disease pregnant or lactating bladder neoplasias
